Light requirements: Spider plants prefer bright light for maximum growth but will still flourish in indirect and fairly low amounts of light. Watering schedule: Regularly, but not so much water so that the soil it soggy (the roots can rot this way).
Light requirements: Indirect or bright sunlight.Watering schedule: Water rarely and make sure the dirt has fully dried between waterings.

Light requirements: Bright indirect light to bright shade. Watering schedule: Water really well in the growing season little over winter. never allow the pot to stand in water.
